zoopedia_button_ltt.br: Click to open Zoopedia and get infomation about this entity.

research_button_ltt.br: Click to start researching this entity.

zookeeper_rec_button_ltt.br: Click to get zookeeper recommendations for this animal, including foliage, food, and toys.

biome_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to display biome brush options based on a specific biome type.

terrain_objects_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to display terrain objects on this panel based on their associated biome.

animal_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to display animals on this panel based on their associated biome.

animal_objects_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to display animal-related objects on this panel based on their research status.

construction_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to display objects on this panel based on their theme or research status.

overheadcameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to the overview map, which allows you to jump directly to any exhibit or specific zoo area.

buildingcameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to an overhead view that allows you to build exhibits and place animals and objects in your zoo.

firstpersoncameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to a 1st person view, where you can walk around your zoo like a guest and perform zookeeper and maintenance tasks.

photocameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to the Photo Safari view, where you can take photographs of the animals and objects in your zoo.

text.b: Are you sure you want to

cancel_exit_zoo_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel exiting the game and return to Zoo Tycoon 2.

exit_zoo_ltt.br: Click to exit the game and return to Windows.

delete_pic_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected photo.

delete_pic_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel deletion of the selected photo.

delete_camera_pics_button_ltt.br: Click to delete all the photos from your camera. Photos in photo albums will not be deleted.

delete_camera_pics_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel deletion of all photos from your camera.

new_profile_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel the creation of a new profile and return to Profile Manager.

profile_create_button_ltt.br: Click to create a new player profile.

delete_profile_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected player profile.

delete_profile_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel the deletion of the selected player profile and return to Profile Manager.

create_new_album_button_ltt.br: Click to create a new photo album, where you can view and organize the photos you've taken of your zoo.

create_new_album_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel creating a new photo album and return to the Photo Album Manager.

delete_album_button_ltt.br: Click to delete this photo album. This will delete all photos included in this photo album.

delete_album_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel deleting the selected photo album and return to the Photo Album Manager.

save_continue_button_ltt.br: Click to save the current game and display the Main Menu.

no_save_continue_button_ltt.br: Click to continue without saving and return to the Main Menu.

return_button_ltt.br: Click to return to the current game.

sell_object_button_ltt.br: Click to sell the selected object. Any profit you earn is automatically added to your bank account.

no_sell_object_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel the sale of this object.

fire_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to fire the selected staff member.

no_fire_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel firing the selected staff member.

delete_game_button_ltt.br: Click to delete this previously saved game.

delete_game_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel the deletion of this previously saved game.

text.b: Do you wish to Save and Exit?

closealbummananger_ltt.br: Click to close this dialog box.

cancel_photochallenge_button_ltt.br: Click to close this dialog and continue the photo challenge.

decline_photochallenge_button_ltt.br: Click to close this dialog and decline this photo challenge.

text.b: Save current game before loading a new one?

save_current_button_ltt.br: Click to save and continue to load a saved game.

decline_save_button_ltt.br: Click to continue to the Load Game screen without saving.

overwrite_button_ltt.br: Click to overwrite the selected saved game.

decline_overwrite_button_ltt.br: Click to not overwrite the selected saved game.

animal_status_info_ltt.br: Click to view the Animal Status panel.

animal_needs_info_ltt.br: Click to review the status of the animal's basic and advanced needs.

animal_general_info_ltt.br: Click to view the animal's gender, biome preference, and geographical location.

adoption_button_ltt.br: Click to put this animal up for adoption so that other zoos may consider acquiring it.

release_button_ltt.br: Click to release this animal into the wild. In order to be eligible to release an animal into the wild, you must first satisfy all of its basic and advanced needs.

pickup_animal_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected animal wherever it is located in the zoo and place it in a new location.

track_animal_button_ltt.br: Click to track the selected animal wherever it is located in the zoo.

crate_animal_button_ltt.br: Click to crate the selected animal wherever it is located, which is helpful when you have an escapee on your hands.

pickup_crate_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected crate (and animal) wherever it is located in the zoo.

uncrate_button_ltt.br: Click to uncrate the selected animal wherever it is located in the zoo.

guest_thoughts_tab_ltt.br: Click to view guests' thoughts as they visit your zoo.

guest_fav_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of the current guest's zoo favorites.

guest_general_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the current guest's activities and to review his or her basic needs.

pickup_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected animal wherever it's located in your zoo.

track_guest_button_ltt.br: Click to track the selected guest wherever he or she is located in the zoo.

zoopedia_button_ltt.br: Click to view the Zoopedia topic that describes this object.

pickup_guest_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected guest wherever he or she is located in your zoo.

pickup_building_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected building or structure wherever it is located in your zoo.

sell_building_button_ltt.br: Click to sell the selected object. Any profit you make will be automatically added to your bank account.

sell_fence_button_ltt.br: Click to sell the selected object. Any profit you make will be automatically added to your bank account.

pickup_generic_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected object wherever it is located in your zoo.

price_free_ltt.br: Click to allow guests to enter your zoo without paying an entrance fee.

price_low_ltt.br: Click to set low prices on the items this building sells.

price_med_ltt.br: Click to set moderate prices on the items this building sells.

price_high_ltt.br: Click to set expensive prices on the items this building sells.

building_status_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the status of the current building.

building_finance_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the sales figures for this building.

building_color_tab_ltt.br: Click to change the color of the building trim.

building_income_last_ltt.br: This field displays last months income.

building_upkeep_last_ltt.br: This field displays last months upkeep.

building_profit_last_ltt.br: This field displays last months profit.

building_income_current_ltt.br: This field displays the current months income.

building_upkeep_current_ltt.br: This field displays the current months upkeep.

building_profit_current_ltt.br: This field displays the current months profit.

staff_status_button_ltt.br: Click to find out what your staff member is doing right now.

staff_assign_button_ltt.br: Click to check on this staff member's current assignments.

staff_thoughts_button_ltt.br: Click to review this staff member's thoughts throughout the day.

staff_salary_button_ltt.br: Click to display this staff member's salary details.

pickup_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected staff member, wherever he or she is located in your zoo.

track_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to track the selected staff member wherever he or she is located in the zoo.

add_assignment_ltt.br: Click and then select an animal to assign it to this zookeeper - a good way to ensure your "star" animals are well cared for.

remove_assignment_ltt.br: Click to remove the selected animal from this zookeeper's list of assignments.

educator_add_assignment_ltt.br: Click and then select a podium to assign it to this educator. Educators can't lecture without a podium.

educator_remove_assignment_ltt.br: Click to remove the selected podium from this educator's list of assignments.

fire_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to fire this staff member.

donation_status_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the donation status panel.

donation_by_species_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the donations by species panel.

biome_icon_ltt.br: This object originates in this type of biome and contributes to making a satisfying habitat for the animals that live there.

animal_biome_icon_ltt.br: This biome is representative of the animals natural habitat and will best satisfy the animals environment need.

location_icon_ltt.br: This object is commonly found in this part of the world.

animal_location_icon_ltt.br: This animal originates from this part of the world.

maximize_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to display the Object Filters panel, where you can show or hide guests, buildings, fences, or foliage in your zoo.

minimize_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to hide the Object Filters panel.

guest_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to show or hide the guests currently visiting your zoo.

building_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to show or hide the buildings you've placed in your zoo.

fence_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to show or hide the fences you've placed in your zoo.

foliage_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to show or hide the plants, trees, shrubs, and grasses you've placed in your zoo.

staffmode.font: Right click to enable the cursor.

cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel loading a game and close the Load Game dialog box.

load_button_ltt.br: Click to load the selected saved game.

delete_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected saved game.

playchallenge_ltt.br: Click to select a map and create a zoo. You can select specific game challenges, but you will have no primary goals.

playfreeform_ltt.br: Click to select a map and create a zoo. You can play with unlimited money, and all animals and objects are available.

playcampaign_ltt.br: Click to select a campaign to play. Each campaign has several scenarios, all with specific goals to complete.

gameoptions_ltt.br: Click to change video, sound, and other game options.

downloads_ltt.br: Click to check the Internet for game updates and new content. You can also enable or disable downloaded content.

loadsave_ltt.br: Click to load and play a previously saved game.

gameexit_ltt.br: Click to exit Zoo Tycoon 2 and return to Windows.

continue_button_ltt.br: Click to load the selected player profile.

delete_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected player profile.

add_button_ltt.br: Click to create a new player profile.

profile_manger_button_ltt.br: Click to manage your player profiles. You can add new profiles, or load or delete existing profiles.

profile_manger_close_button_ltt.br: Click to close the Profile Manager.

font.name: arial
font.b: This program is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws.

font.name: arial
font.b: Developed by Blue Fang Games, LLC

tutorial_panel_play_ltt.br: Click to play through the Zoo Tycoon 2 Tutorials.

tutorial_panel_dont_play_ltt.br: Click to skip the Zoo Tycoon 2 Tutorials and just play the game.

color.b: Would you like to learn how to play Zoo Tycoon 2?

open_queue_button_ltt.br: Click to open the message queue to view a list of messages about your zoo.

animal_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the animals in your zoo.

animal_sort_type_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals by species type.

animal_sort_env_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals based on how well their environmental needs are being met.

animal_sort_hunger_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals based on how well their hunger needs are being met.

animal_sort_thirst_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals based on how well each animal's thirst needs are being met.

animal_sort_rest_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals based on how well each animal's need for rest is being met.

animal_sort_exercise_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals based on how well each animal's need for exercise is being met.

animal_sort_sick_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals based on how sick or well they are.

animal_sort_happy_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals based on their happiness levels.

animal_sort_pregnant_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals based on which ones are pregnant.

guest_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the guests in your zoo.

guest_sort_type_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests by gender and age.

guest_sort_happy_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on how happy they are while visiting your zoo.

guest_sort_fav_animal_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on which animal is their favorite.

guest_sort_hunger_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on how well their hunger needs are being met.

guest_sort_thirst_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on how well their thirst needs are being met.

guest_sort_rest_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on how well their needs for rest are being met.

guest_sort_amusement_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on how well their need to be amused is being met.

guest_sort_bathroom_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on who needs to go to the bathroom and who doesn't.

guest_sort_thought_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on their current thoughts about your zoo.

staff_sort_type_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of staff by type - zookeeper, maintenance worker, and educator.

staff_sort_task_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of staff members based on their current tasks.

staff_sort_assign_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of staff members based on their current assignments.

staff_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the staff currrently working in your zoo.

full_screen_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 in full-screen mode.

windowed_screen_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 in a window, with your desktop still visible.

high_detail_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 with the highest video quality. You'll see more detail, but it may cause slower game performance.

medium_detail_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 with medium video quality, which strikes a balance between video detail and game performance.

low_detail_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 with the lowest video quality. You'll see less detail, but it may improve game performance.

custom_detail_button_ltt.br: Select to choose your own custom settings for video detail.

font.name: arial
font.br: Slide this bar to adjust how detailed the environment is in the zoo world. Detailed environment may slow game performance.

font.name: arial
font.br: Slide this bar to adjust how detailed the shadows are in the zoo world. Detailed shadows may slow game performance.

font.name: arial
font.br: Slide this bar to change the level of detailed objects displayed in the terrain, including small tufts of grass and rocks that are appropriate to the terrain's biome type.

exit_dowload_button_ltt.br: Click to exit the Downloads screen and return to the game.

apply_button_ltt.br: Click to apply all selected changes and exit now.

exit_options_button_ltt.br: Click to exit the Game Options screen and cancel any changes you've made

master_audio_higher_button_ltt.br: Click to increase the master volume, which includes animal and environment sound effects.

master_audio_lower_button_ltt.br: Click to decrease the master volume, which includes animal and environment sound effects.

master_audio_thumb_button_ltt.br: Slide this bar left or right to change the master volume, which includes animal and environment sound effects.

music_audio_higher_button_ltt.br: Click to increase the volume level of the music that plays when menus are displayed.

music_audio_lower_button_ltt.br: Click to decrease the volume level of the music that plays when menus are displayed.

music_audio_thumb_button_ltt.br: Slide this bar left or right to change the volume of the music that plays when menus are displayed.

misc_panel_tab_ltt.br: Click to change Zoo Guest mode and Message of the Day options.

misc_mouse_look_button_ltt.br: Select to have the ability to look around your zoo using the mouse while in Zoo Guest mode.

misc_motd_button_ltt.br: Select to allow Zoo Tycoon 2 to connect to the Internet, download new messages, and display them on the Main Menu.

enable_content_ltt.br: Select to enable or disable downloaded content from the Internet for use in Zoo Tycoon 2.

show_content_ltt.br: Select to open the directory in which the new downloaded content is stored.

setting_slider_thumb_ltt.br: Slide this bar left or right to change this video detail setting.

setting_slider_higher_ltt.br: Click to increase the video detail setting.

setting_slider_lower_ltt.br: Click to decrease the video detail setting.

album_selecter_button_ltt.br: Click to select a new or existing photo album.

createnew_button_ltt.br: Click to create and name a new photo album.

delete_album_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected photo album.

clearall_button_ltt.br: Click to delete all the photos in this photo album.

delete_all_pics_button_ltt.br: Click to clear the film and delete all photos from the camera.

delete_pic_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected photo.

move_pic_button_ltt.br: Click to move the selected photo to the current photo album.

save_html_button_ltt.br: Click to export the selected photo album to an HTML file that you can share by posting it on the Internet.

prevpage_button_ltt.br: Click to view the previous page in the photo album.

nextpage_button_ltt.br: Click to view the next page in the photo album.

return_button_ltt.br: Click to close the photo album and return to the game.

return_to_album_ltt.br: Click to return to the photo album.

large_pic_ltt.br: Click to select a photo or double-click to enlarge a photo. Once selected, you can move the photo to an album or delete it.

continue_button_ltt.br: Click to use the currently selected photo album and return to the main Photo Album screen.

accept_button_ltt.br: Click to accept this game challenge.

decline_button_ltt.br: Click to decline this game challenge.

color.b: Do you wish to continue playing this scenario?

continue_button_ltt.br: Click to continue playing this scenario.

continue_next_button_ltt.br: Click to play the next scenario.

no_continue_button_ltt.br: Click to exit to the Main Menu.

color.b: Do you wish to restart this scenario?

challenge_failed_ok_button_ltt.br: Click to continue playing this scenario.

challenge_won_ok_button_ltt.br: Click to continue playing this scenario.

font.name: arial
font.b: Press the spacebar to take a photo

photo_zoopedia_button_ltt.br: Click to open Zoopedia and get information about Photo Safari.

help_button_ltt.br: Click to close this help screen.

color.b: Cllick the X button to close this panel.
Press the "C" key to toggle the camera on and off.
Press the SPACEBAR to take a photo.

cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to close the Save Game dialog box.

save_button_ltt.br: Click to save the game using the name you've entered.

delete_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected saved game.

pgb_construction_ltt.br: Click to view the Construction panel, where you can buy fences, paths, buildings, benches, fountains, trash cans, and more.

construction_fence_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the Fences tab, which shows the fences and gates you can buy.

construction_fenceplacement_octagon_mode.br: Click to start fence placement, and then move the mouse to adjust the size of the octagonal fence. Click again to finish.

construction_fenceplacement_rectangle_mo.br: Click to start fence placement, and then move the mouse to adjust the size of the rectangular fence. Click again to finish.

construction_fenceplacement_clickdrag_mo.br: Click to place one section of fence.
Click and then move the mouse to construct multiple fence sections. Click again to complete the fence.

construction_fenceplacement_rubberband_m.br: Click to start fence placement. Subsequent clicks will place additional fence sections. Right-click to finish.

construction_path_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the Paths tab, which shows the different types of paths you can buy.

pgb_animal_ltt.br: Click to view the Animals panel, where you can adopt animals or buy enrichment objects, shelters, and food for your animals.

decline_button_ltt.br: Click to decline currently selected animal for adoption.

female_button_ltt.br: Click to view the female animals you can adopt.

male_button_ltt.br: Click to view the male animals you can adopt.

animal_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the animals currently available for adoption.

animal_enrichment_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the toys and other enrichment objects that you can buy for your animals.

animal_food_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the types of food you can buy for your animals.

animal_shelter_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the types of shelters you can buy for your animals.

pgb_structures_ltt.br: Click to view the structures panel, where you can buy buildings and scenery items.

structures_scenery_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the scenery items you can buy for your zoo, including benches, trash cans, decorative arches, fountains, and statues.

structures_building_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the buildings you can buy for your zoo, including food and beverage stands, restaurants, ATMs, and restrooms.

pgb_terrain_ltt.br: Click to view the landscaping tools which let you place trees, plants, and rocks, and create hills, valleys, and lakes.

terrain_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the six terrain modification tools you can use to flatten or smooth surfaces and create cliffs, mountains, and plateaus.

hill_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Create Hill brush, and then click or click and hold on the terrain to create hills.

valley_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Create Valley brush, and then click or click and hold on the terrain to create valleys of varying depths.

flatten_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Flatten Terrain brush, and then click or click and hold on the terrain to flatten raised terrain and create plateaus.

smooth_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Smooth Terrain brush, and then click or click and hold on the terrain to smooth rough terrain or to create smooth hills.

cliff_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Create Cliff brush, and then click or click and hold on the terrain to create cliffs.

ditch_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Create Ditch brush. Then click or click and hold on the terrain to create ditches.

terrain_biome_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can choose a biome type and then use the mouse to paint the terrain with plants and trees appropriate to that biome.

previousbiome_ltt.br: Click to view the previous biome.

nextbiome_ltt.br: Click to view the next biome.

brushincrease_ltt.br: Click to increase the size of the area the Biome Brush or Terrain Modification tool paints each time you click the mouse.

brushdecrease_ltt.br: Click to decrease the size of the area the Biome Brush or Terrain Modification tool paints each time you click the mouse.

terrain_tree_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the different types of trees you can buy.

terrain_plant_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the different types of plants you can buy.

terrain_rock_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the various rocks you can buy.

pgb_staff_ltt.br: Click to view the Staff panel, where you can hire staff members, including zookeepers, maintenance workers, and educators.

staff_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can choose staff members including zookeepers, maintenance workers, and educators.

keeper_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can choose a male or female zookeeper. A zookeeper can take care of all of the needs of the animals in your zoo.

mw_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can hire maintenance workers who will empty trash cans and clean up animal droppings in your zoo.

educator_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can hire educators, who can give informative talks to guests about animals, satisfying their thirst for knowledge.

zoom_in_button_ltt.br: Click to zoom in for a closer look at your zoo. You can also use a mouse wheel to zoom in.

zoom_out_button_ltt.br: Click to zoom out for a higher-level look at your zoo. You can also use a mouse wheel to zoom out.

rotate_counter_clockwise_button_ltt.br: Click to rotate your view of the zoo in a counter-clockwise direction.

rotate_clockwise_button_ltt.br: Click to rotate your view of the zoo in a clockwise direction.

multiinfo_button_ltt.br: Click to access information about your animals, guests, and staff.

undo_button_ltt.br: Click to undo your last action.

zoo_fame_button_ltt.br: Click to display information about zoo fame.

recycle_button_ltt.br: Click to change the cursor to a bulldozer, and then click any zoo object to delete it. You'll receive cash for recycling most objects.

scenario_goals_button_ltt.br: Click to display information about the current goals and challenges.

options_button_ltt.br: Click to display the Game Options menu, where you can save games, load games, return to the Main Menu, or exit Zoo Tycoon 2.

zoo_finance_button_ltt.br: Click to display information about your zoo, including income and expenses, buildings, awards, donations, and informative graphs.

photo_album_button_ltt.br: Click to view and organize photos taken in Photo Safari mode.

rotate_clock_ltt.br: Click to rotate the selected object clockwise before placing it.

rotate_counter-clock_ltt.br: Click to rotate the selected object counter-clockwise before placing it.

maximize_ui_button_ltt.br: Click to expand the Game Controls panel to its maximize size, displaying the most information possible but obscuring some of your zoo.

minimize_ui_button_ltt.br: Click to reduce the Game Controls panel to its minimum size, obscuring your view of your zoo as little as possible.

zoo_money_button_ltt.br: Click to display your zoo's income and expense report.

pause_button_ltt.br: Click to toggle between playing and pausing.

primary_goals_tab_ltt.br: This tab lists the primary goals for the current scenario.

primary_show_all_goals_button_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the goals for the current scenario.

primary_show_all_completed_goals_button_.br: Click to view a list of all the goals you've completed for this scenario.

primary_show_all_uncompleted_goals_butto.br: Click to view a list of all the goals you have not yet completed for this scenario.

photo_goals_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the Photo Safari challenges, where you use a camera to meet your goals.

introduction_tab_ltt.br: Click to view an introduction to the current goals and challenges.

continue_tutorial_button_ltt.br: Click to continue on to the next step of the tutorial.

exit_button_ltt.br: Click to close Zoopedia and return to the game.

next_topic_button_ltt.br: Click to view the next Zoopedia topic.

prev_topic_button_ltt.br: Click to view the previous Zoopedia topic.

toc_button_ltt.br: Click to view the Zoopedia Table of Contents.

export_map_button_ltt.br: Click to export a copy of this map to HTML so that you can share it with other zoo tycoons.

exit_button_ltt.br: Click to close the zoo overview map and return to the game.

legend_item_ltt.br: Click to show or hide items on the zoo overview map.

info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view and adjust zoo admission price and to check your zoo's operational status.

info_price_up_button_ltt.br: Click to increase the admission price of the zoo. A higher admission price can lead to fewer guests with higher expectations.

info_price_down_button_ltt.br: Click to decrease the admission price for your zoo, which may result in more guests visiting your zoo.

close_ltt.br: Click to close this panel and return to the main game window.

marketing_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the Income & Expense report for your zoo.

graphs_tab_ltt.br: Click to view graphs that chart your zoo's progress in a variety of categories over time.

awards_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the awards your zoo has received.

building_list_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of the buildings in your zoo and their economic statistics.

donations_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a summary of donations your zoo has received.

donations_summary_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to view a summary of donations your zoo has received.

donations_species_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to view a summary of donations by species your zoo has received.

zoo_fame_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the summary of zoo fame.

zoo_fame_num_animals_ltt.br: The more animals you have in your zoo, the more famous it becomes. Add animals to your zoo to increase your fame.

zoo_fame_animal_variety_ltt.br: Having multiple species in your zoo makes it more famous. Try adopting animals from many different species in order to become as famous as possible!

zoo_fame_animal_happiness_ltt.br: Even if you have lots of animals from many different kinds of species, if they arent happy then your zoo wont be famous. Keep your animals happy by meeting their needs.

zoo_fame_guest_educated_by_animals_ltt.br: Guests are educated by seeing animals in their native habitats. If you make sure each animal in your zoo is in an appropriate habitat then your zoo is more educational. Educational zoos are more famous.

zoo_fame_guest_entertained_by_animals_lt.br: Guests like having a good view of healthy, happy, and active animals. They also like rare and exotic animals. To ensure guests are enjoying your animals make sure the animals are happy, they have lots of things to do, and that guests can view them from close-up.

zoo_fame_guest_average_happiness_ltt.br: Even if your zoo is educational and your animals are very entertaining, if your guests arent happy, then your zoo wont be famous. Keep your guests happy by meeting their needs.

zoo_fame_awards_ltt.br: Your zoo can become more famous by meeting challenges and earning awards. You wont lose this fame.

zoo_fame_animal_release_wild_ltt.br: Releasing animals into the wild increases the fame for your zoo. You wont lose this fame.

zoostatus.graph_value_tab_ltt: Click to view of your zoo's value over time.

graph_profit_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph of your zoo's monthly profit over time.

graph_donations_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph of your zoo's monthly donations over time.

graph_attendance_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph of your zoo's monthly attendance over time.

graph_fame_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph of your zoo's fame and recognition level over time.

graph_members_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph that charts the number of zoo members your zoo has signed up over time.

graph_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to change the graphs to display in bar graph format.

line_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to change the graphs to display in line graph format.

open_zoo_ltt.br: Click to open the zoo for guests to enjoy.

close_zoo_ltt.br: Click to close the zoo. No guests will visit when the zoo is closed.

price_low_zs_ltt.br: Click to set low prices on entrance.

price_med_zs_ltt.br: Click to set moderate prices on entrance.

price_high_zs_ltt.br: Click to set expensive prices on entrance.
